channel.title: Need help
channel.description: My compiler has a problem with it, when i compile something i just edited it says * the system cannot find the path specified. Press Any Key to continue * and when i click edit jdk1.6.0_16 it shows that and some other things and im not really sure if i got that Java Version i got jdk6u20 if u can help me i'd really appreciate it.

item.title: Need help
item.dc:creator: @mich702703 mich702703
item.description:
@mich702703 wrote:

iv had the same problem… try this:

@echo off if exist "%programfiles%\Java" (call :compile "%programfiles%\Java\") else (goto error) :compile for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe") if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java) if defined p (goto end) :error echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load. "%programfiles%\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe" http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp :end echo Finished! pause exit

Read full topic
